name: Fast Whisper
tag_list: fastwhisper-com, sma, social-media-advertising, facebook-advertising, twitter-advertising, linkedin-advertising, fast-whisper
description: We get People talking about you
overview:
FastWhisper.com - ‘We get People talking about you’

FastWhisper is the World’s first Multi Social Network Advertising Platform.

Tap in to the emotional human network of 1.3 Billion people spread across Facebook, Twitter and Linkedin to start with.

Tap in to the emotional human network of 1.3 Billion people spread across Facebook, Twitter and Linkedin to start with.

Engage Consumers in Real Time and at the Right Time as and when needed for dynamic pricing

Instantly Increase Brand and Product Awareness by utilizing ‘World’s first Real Human Being Network’

Reach Consumers on Multiple Social Networks, Platforms and Devices instantly

Drive Clicks to Your Online Destination Grow Your Audience Online

Match influencer’s with your brand based on your target audience and campaign objectives.

Target Highly Endemic Audiences

Fast Whisper offers brands a full range of social advertising solutions that are customized to achieve campaign objectives.

High-performing content copy is created to inspire engagement while staying authentic to the influencer voice.

Fast Whisper provides key metric data on each campaign reflecting overall success of the campaign.
